m_szDocTitle: Fukushima Fuel Transfer Reaches 10% Milestone | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Fukushima Fuel Transfer Reaches 10% Milestone January 15th, 2014 by Sandy Dechert   Fukushima nuclear power station as unit 4 operations commenced (screen shot from euronews broadcast, November 11, 2013.) TEPCO announced 10% completion of the spent fuel transfer this week. Tokyo Electric Power Company has reached a minor milestone in cleaning up the mess that started at its Fukushima nuclear power station on Friday, March 11, 2011 (March 12, U.S.). A subsea earthquake off the Pacific coast of Tōhoku, the resulting tsunami, and an unfortunate series of human miscalculations have dogged the ruin
